reviewText: Video shows how to pack a lot of reps into a short amount of time.  As useful for high school as it is for youth league, due to the high amount of reps and constant activity.  Once you start using these drills, it's easy to start incorporating drills based on your needs at the time...i.e. your baserunners are struggling picking up the pitch in the dirt.  Incorporate this with blocking drills at the plate.  Bottom line...Coach Brew gives you tool you can adapt easily and often.
